about_the_game:
A true master of alchemy needs not only original decorations, but also a mount to move between cauldrons faster, as well as items to add bonuses to these decorations.

Tilter Combat Helm (Eternal)
Not only the original appearance, but also useful bonuses. Can be upgraded by assigning 1 to 3 random stats with the Cube of Fortune and then changing their values ​​using the Cube of the Nameless.
Poisonous Steam Boiler (eternal)
This jewelry is fraught with gloomy mysteries of the most distant corners of the world.
Summon Shieldback Whistle
When used, summons a shieldback for faster movement. Increases speed by 70%.
Small Fortune Cube
Assigns 1 random stat to Eternal Ornamental Headpieces. The maximum and minimum possible value of the assigned attribute depends on the character's current level.
Weak Magic Feather
Applied to a back attachment and removes its temporary restrictions. Allows you to get a random pattern (gain).

Buying this set, you get items at a big dis

name: Sphere 3 - Master of Alchemy

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Dual core more than 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader 3.0 support Geforce 6600, Radeon X1600, 256 Mb RAM and DirectX 9.0c support
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX support
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 (32 or 64-bit)
  • Processor: Quad-core more than 2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader 3.0 support Geforce 8800, Radeon HD4000, 512 Mb RAM and DirectX 9.0c support
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX support

short_description: A true master of alchemy needs not only original decorations, but also a mount to move between cauldrons faster, as well as items to add bonuses to these decorations.
supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Turkish, French, Italian, German, Polish, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
